column5: Headed out a few times this week.  Wed and Sat.  Both days the Chinook were on fire.  Best thing about this week is that I was able to get 4 people into their first salmon.  My wife, my student, a coworker and his brother who was visiting from Albania.  What a blast seeing people feel the power of a King for the first time.  Here are some pics.                              I even managed a few...       Good times..  Sherriff
They were probably attracted to the ugly hat on your head!  Nice ones man.
wow awesom!  you got a pm
WOW.....you guys sure hit the jackpot on those chinook.  Congratulation to you sherriff and your passengers ..... Fantastic report  Thanks for sharing Leechman
Ain't that the truth!  Well done Sherriff. -Brian
Awesome looking fish, seeing anyone catch their first of any species is always rewarding.
The smiles say it all. Looks like good action and everyone had fun. Thanks for sharing.
